description: Enterprise techniques used by dsquery, ATT&CK software S0105 v1.2
name: dsquery (S0105)

techniques.comment: [dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) can be used to gather information on user accounts within a domain.(Citation: TechNet Dsquery)
[dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) can be used to gather information on domain trusts with dsquery * -filter "(objectClass=trustedDomain)" -attr *.(Citation: Harmj0y Domain Trusts)
[dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) can be used to gather information on permission groups within a domain.(Citation: TechNet Dsquery)
